DOC.brief_summary: Suicide significant cause death Korea . According report compile Korea National Statistical Office , 24.8 victim every 100,000 2007 ( Korea National Statistical Office , 2008 ) , high compare 10.1 United States , 6.0 United Kingdom , 19.1 Japan ( Organisation Economic Co-operation Development , 2008 ) . Especially , suicide rate incredibly high elderly . Most person commit suicide diagnose psychiatric disorder . Among , 60 % Depression commit suicide . Therefore , study aim impact care management intervention depression treatment reduce suicidal ideation elderly patient depression .
